Description: Job descriptionAn exciting and  professional role , which involves meeting with property owners and prospective and clients, scheduling property viewings, and prospecting properties for clients to secure financial transactions.Who are we looking for?- A highly motivated individual who is self-disciplined and has 'a passion' for real estate.- Excellent time Management and organizational skillscommunicate clearly and effectively with clients.- Well-versed in English (Verbal and Written)- Several years of verified sales experienceSkills
Skills: - A generous commission pay structure with unlimited earning potential.
- Excellent platform and 'on-going' 1 month training to embark your real estate career.
- Access to lead generation system and maximum exposure on all property portals.
- Employment visa, RERA training and commission incentives.
- Area Specialist Focus to gain competitive advantage.
- Prepare a daily action plan and set regular targets.
- Generate new property listings via networking, site-visits and regular meetings and cold-calls.
- Schedule property viewings with potential clients and take notes on client requirements and
- Follow proper documentation on all transactions and ensure full compliance of Laws and
- Understand client requirements, and present several options to buyers/tenants for their property
search to short-list properties and finalise the deal.
- Provide honest feedback to clients and promote ethics and integrity on all transactions.
